context.notes: The chaotic heart of the city. A maze of stalls, workshops, and tenements.

dataStatic.description: The smell of roasted nuts, unwashed bodies, and forge smoke is constant. Carts jam every intersection.

law.notes: Patrols stick to the main thoroughfares. Alleys are unpoliced.

attitudes.note: They are seen as big spenders but trouble magnets.

properties.name: Fishmonger's Hill
properties.description: A steep, cobbled street that gets slippery with fish slime.
